titles.title: A bill to amend section 313 of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to eliminate an exception that permits certain Members of Congress to use amounts from excess campaign funds for personal purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to remove the authority for certain Members of Congress to use excess campaign funds for personal purposes.
